count_per_folder.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'mailbox_message' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.source_id, doc.metadata.folder], 1); }

listing_by_mailbox.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'mailbox_message' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.source_id, doc.metadata.timestamp], {'timestamp': doc.metadata.timestamp, 'from': doc.metadata.from, 'to': doc.metadata.to, 'caller_id_number': doc.metadata.caller_id_number, 'caller_id_name': doc.metadata.caller_id_name, 'call_id': doc.metadata.call_id, 'folder': doc.metadata.folder, 'length': doc.metadata.length, 'media_id': doc.metadata.media_id}); }
